network.chainId: The chain ID of the network (e.g. 84532 for Base Sepolia)
network.environment: The environment type - can be 'testnet' or 'mainnet'
network.centrifugeId: Unique identifier for this network in the Centrifuge ecosystem. Sequence 1,2,3,4 etc.
network.connectsTo: List of networks this network can connect to. Use the same names as the env/$chainName.json files

adapters.axelar: Get values from https://docs.axelar.dev/axelar-api/chain-ids - axelarId is the Chain Name field

metadata.contracts: Deployed contract addresses. Leave empty, it'll be populated by the deployment script.
